001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Mediator;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Pair;
005
006import java.util.*;
007
008/**
009 * Provides a standard implementation for a neural network.
010 * <p>
011 * A neural network is modeled here as an extensible estimation strategy: it accepts
012 * inputs (features), transforms them through a series of layers composed of {@link Neuron}s
013 * and weighted connections, and produces outputs (predictions).
014 * </p>
015 */
016@Mediator
017public class DefaultNeuralNetwork implements NeuralNetwork {
018
019    private final List<List<? extends Neuron>> layers;
020    private final Map<Neuron, Pair<Integer, Integer>> positions;
021    private final Map<Neuron, List<Neuron>> connections;
022
023    /**
024     * Constructs a neural network for the provided layers.
025     *
026     * @param layers the layers of the neural network
027     */
028    public DefaultNeuralNetwork(List<List<? extends Neuron>> layers) {
029        this.layers = layers;
030        this.positions = NeuralNetworks.getNeuronPositions(layers);
031        this.connections = NeuralNetworks.getNeuronConnections(layers);
032    }
033
034    /**
035     * {@inheritDoc}
036     */
037    @Override
038    public int getWidth(int l) {
039        return layers.get(l).size();
040    }
041
042    /**
043     * {@inheritDoc}
044     */
045    @Override
046    public int getDepth() {
047        return layers.size() - 1;
048    }
049
050    /**
051     * {@inheritDoc}
052     */
053    @Override
054    public Neuron getNeuron(int l, int j) {
055        return layers.get(l).get(j);
056    }
057
058    /**
059     * {@inheritDoc}
060     */
061    @Override
062    public <N extends Neuron> N getNeuron(int l, int j, Class<N> classType) {
063        return classType.cast(getNeuron(l, j));
064    }
065
066    /**
067     * {@inheritDoc}
068     */
069    @Override
070    public Map<Neuron, Float> getOutputConnections(int l, int j) {
071        Neuron neuron = getNeuron(l, j);
072        List<Neuron> connectedNeurons = connections.get(neuron);
073        Map<Neuron, Float> outputConnections = new IdentityHashMap<>();
074        if (connectedNeurons != null) {
075            for (Neuron connectedNeuron : connectedNeurons) {
076                outputConnections.put(connectedNeuron, connectedNeuron.getWeight(neuron));
077            }
078        }
079        return outputConnections;
080    }
081
082    /**
083     * {@inheritDoc}
084     */
085    @Override
086    public Set<Neuron> getTargetNeurons(Neuron neuron) {
087        List<Neuron> neurons = connections.get(neuron);
088        return neurons == null ? Set.of() : new HashSet<>(neurons);
089    }
090
091    /**
092     * {@inheritDoc}
093     */
094    @Override
095    public int getParameterCount() {
096        int parameterCount = 0;
097        for (List<? extends Neuron> layer : layers) {
098            for (Neuron neuron : layer) {
099                if (neuron instanceof InputNeuron) {
100                    continue;
101                }
102                parameterCount += neuron.getParameterCount();
103            }
104        }
105        return parameterCount;
106    }
107
108    /**
109     * {@inheritDoc}
110     */
111    @Override
112    public float[] getParameters() {
113        float[] parameters = new float[getParameterCount()];
114        int i = 0;
115        for (List<? extends Neuron> layer : layers) {
116            for (Neuron neuron : layer) {
117                if (neuron instanceof InputNeuron) {
118                    continue;
119                }
120                for (int d = 1; d <= neuron.arity(); d++) {
121                    parameters[i++] = neuron.getWeight(d);
122                }
123                parameters[i++] = neuron.getBias();
124            }
125        }
126        return parameters;
127    }
128
129    /**
130     * {@inheritDoc}
131     */
132    @Override
133    public float[] estimate(float... inputs) {
134        for (List<? extends Neuron> layer : layers) {
135            layer.forEach(Neuron::deactivate);
136        }
137        for (int j = 0; j < inputs.length; j++) {
138            ((InputNeuron) layers.get(0).get(j)).setInputValue(inputs[j]);
139        }
140        for (List<? extends Neuron> layer : layers) {
141            layer.forEach(Neuron::activate);
142        }
143        List<? extends Neuron> outputLayer = layers.get(layers.size() - 1);
144        float[] outputs = new float[outputLayer.size()];
145        for (int j = 0; j < outputs.length; j++) {
146            outputs[j] = outputLayer.get(j).getOutput();
147        }
148        return outputs;
149    }
150
151    /**
152     * {@inheritDoc}
153     */
154    @Override
155    public int arity() {
156        return layers.get(0).size();
157    }
158
159    /**
160     * {@inheritDoc}
161     */
162    @Override
163    public int coArity() {
164        return layers.get(layers.size() - 1).size();
165    }
166
167    /**
168     * Accepts a visitor to inspect the complete neural network
169     *
170     * @param visitor the visitor to apply to this network
171     */
172    @Override
173    public void accept(NeuronVisitor visitor) {
174        if (visitor == null) {
175            return;
176        }
177        visitor.enterNetwork(this);
178
179        int depth = getDepth();
180        for (int l = 1; l <= depth; l++) {
181            visitor.enterLayer(this, l);
182
183            int width = getWidth(l);
184            for (int j = 0; j < width; j++) {
185                Neuron neuron = getNeuron(l, j, Neuron.class);
186                visitor.visitNeuron(this, neuron, l, j);
187
188                Map<Neuron, Float> outs = getOutputConnections(l, j);
189                if (outs != null) {
190                    for (Map.Entry<Neuron, Float> connection : outs.entrySet()) {
191                        Neuron target = connection.getKey();
192                        Pair<Integer, Integer> targetPosition = positions.get(target);
193                        visitor.visitConnection(this, neuron, l, j,
194                                target, targetPosition.left(), targetPosition.right(), connection.getValue());
195                    }
196                }
197            }
198
199            visitor.exitLayer(this, l);
200        }
201
202        visitor.exitNetwork(this);
203    }
204}
